channel.title: Roadmaps on Kritika Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Roadmaps on Kritika Docs

item.title: Roadmap
item.description:
• Pull Request support
  • Org Repositories
  • Duplications
  • More Rules profiles (like #TODO search, file name patterns, etc)
  • Integration with BitBucket and GitLab
  • Private Repositories
  • Kritika Enterprise (install Kritika on your own server)
